Western al-Bab offensive (September 2016.Date: 30 August - 6 September 2016 | (1 week; First phase) | 24-28 September 2016 | (4 days; Second phase)

Western al-Bab offensive (September 2016.Result: Limited SDF gains | SDF capture 7 villages | ISIL launches four counter-attacks
